verses.verse: וַיַּגֵּ֤ד <S%H5046><s%> vai-yag-Ged told אַחְאָב֙ <S%H256><s%> 'ach-'Av And Ahab לְאִיזֶ֔בֶל <S%H348><s%> le-'i-Ze-vel, Jezebel אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher and how עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah had done אֵלִיָּ֑הוּ <S%H452><s%> 'e-li-Ya-hu; all that Elijah וְאֵ֨ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher and how הָרַ֛ג <S%H2026><s%> ha-Rag and withal how he had slain אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַנְּבִיאִ֖ים <S%H5030><s%> han-ne-vi-'Im all the prophets בֶּחָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> be-Cha-rev. with the sword

וַתִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> vat-tish-Lach sent אִיזֶ֙בֶל֙ <S%H348><s%> 'i-Ze-vel Then Jezebel מַלְאָ֔ךְ <S%H4397><s%> mal-'Ach, a messenger אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אֵלִיָּ֖הוּ <S%H452><s%> 'e-li-Ya-hu unto Elijah לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- So יַעֲשׂ֤וּן <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Sun do אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him So let the gods וְכֹ֣ה <S%H3541><s%> ve-Choh and even יוֹסִפ֔וּן <S%H3254><s%> yo-si-Fun, [to me] and more כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- if כָעֵ֤ת <S%H6256><s%> cha-'Et about this time מָחָר֙ <S%H4279><s%> ma-Char of them by to morrow אָשִׂ֣ים <S%H7760><s%> 'a-Sim also if I make אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נַפְשְׁךָ֔ <S%H5315><s%> naf-she-Cha, not thy life כְּנֶ֖פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> ke-Ne-fesh as the life אַחַ֥ד <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chad of one מֵהֶֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> me-Hem. like

וַיַּ֗רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar, And when he saw וַיָּ֙קָם֙ <S%H6965><s%> vai-Ya-kom [that] he arose וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech and ran אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about נַפְשׁ֔וֹ <S%H5315><s%> naf-Sho, for his life וַיָּבֹ֕א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo and came בְּאֵ֥ר be-'Er שֶׁ֖בַע <S%H884><s%> She-va' to Beersheba אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לִֽיהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> li-hu-Dah; which [belongeth] to Judah וַיַּנַּ֥ח <S%H3240><s%> vai-yan-Nach and left אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נַעֲר֖וֹ <S%H5288><s%> na-'a-Ro his servant שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> Sham. there

וְהֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> ve-hu- himself הָלַ֤ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ha-Lach But he himself went בַּמִּדְבָּר֙ <S%H4057><s%> bam-mid-Bar into the wilderness דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> De-rech journey י֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom, a day's וַיָּבֹ֕א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo and came וַיֵּ֕שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> vai-Ye-shev and sat down תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat under רֹ֣תֶם <S%H7574><s%> Ro-tem juniper tree; אֶחָת 'e-chat כאֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad; a קוַיִּשְׁאַ֤ל <S%H7592><s%> vai-yish-'Al and he requested אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נַפְשׁוֹ֙ <S%H5315><s%> naf-Sho for himself לָמ֔וּת <S%H4191><s%> la-Mut, that he might die וַיֹּ֣אמֶר׀ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer and said רַ֗ב <S%H7227><s%> Rav, It is enough עַתָּ֤ה <S%H6258><s%> 'at-Tah now יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh now O LORD קַ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> kach take away נַפְשִׁ֔י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi, my life כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- I am not ט֥וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov for I [am] not better אָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi my מֵאֲבֹתָֽי׃ <S%H1><s%> me-'a-vo-Tai. than my fathers

וַיִּשְׁכַּב֙ <S%H7901><s%> vai-yish-Kav And as he lay וַיִּישַׁ֔ן <S%H3462><s%> vai-yi-Shan, and slept תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat under רֹ֣תֶם <S%H7574><s%> Ro-tem juniper tree אֶחָ֑ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad; under a וְהִנֵּֽה־ <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-neh- and behold זֶ֤ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh there מַלְאָךְ֙ <S%H4397><s%> mal-'oCh behold then an angel נֹגֵ֣עַ <S%H5060><s%> no-Ge-a' touched בּ֔וֹ bo, וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer him and said ל֖וֹ lo ק֥וּם <S%H6965><s%> kum unto him Arise אֱכֽוֹל׃ <S%H398><s%> e-Chol. [and] eat

וַיַּבֵּ֕ט <S%H5027><s%> vai-yab-Bet And he looked וְהִנֵּ֧ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold מְרַאֲשֹׁתָ֛יו <S%H4763><s%> me-ra-'a-sho-Tav at his head עֻגַ֥ת <S%H5692><s%> 'u-Gat and behold [there was] a cake רְצָפִ֖ים <S%H7529><s%> re-tza-Fim baken on the coals וְצַפַּ֣חַת <S%H6835><s%> ve-tzap-Pa-chat and a cruse מָ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim; of water וַיֹּ֣אכַל <S%H398><s%> vai-Yo-chal And he did eat וַיֵּ֔שְׁתְּ <S%H8354><s%> vai-Ye-shet, and drink וַיָּ֖שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> vai-Ya-shov again וַיִּשְׁכָּֽב׃ <S%H7901><s%> vai-yish-Kav. and laid him down

וַיָּשָׁב֩ <S%H7725><s%> vai-ya-Shav came again מַלְאַ֨ךְ <S%H4397><s%> mal-'Ach And the angel יְהוָ֤ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD שֵׁנִית֙ <S%H8145><s%> she-Nit the second time וַיִּגַּע־ <S%H5060><s%> vai-yig-ga'- and touched בּ֔וֹ bo, וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer him and said ק֣וּם <S%H6965><s%> kum Arise אֱכֹ֑ל <S%H398><s%> 'e-Chol; [and] eat כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki because רַ֥ב <S%H7227><s%> rav [is] too great מִמְּךָ֖ <S%H4480><s%> mi-me-Cha is too הַדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <S%H1870><s%> had-Da-rech. because the journey

וַיָּ֖קָם <S%H6965><s%> vai-Ya-kom And he arose וַיֹּ֣אכַל <S%H398><s%> vai-Yo-chal and did eat וַיִּשְׁתֶּ֑ה <S%H8354><s%> vai-yish-Teh; and drink וַיֵּ֜לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech and went בְּכֹ֣חַ׀ <S%H3581><s%> be-Cho-ach in the strength הָאֲכִילָ֣ה <S%H396><s%> ha-'a-chi-Lah of that meat הַהִ֗יא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hi, he אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> 'ar-ba-'Im forty יוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> yOm days וְאַרְבָּעִ֣ים <S%H705><s%> ve-'ar-ba-'Im and forty לַ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> Lay-lah, nights עַ֛ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad against הַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> har the mount הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him of God חֹרֵֽב׃ <S%H2722><s%> cho-Rev. unto Horeb

וַיָּבֹא־ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-vo- And he came שָׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> sham there אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַמְּעָרָ֖ה <S%H4631><s%> ham-me-'a-Rah thither unto a cave וַיָּ֣לֶן <S%H3885><s%> vai-Ya-len and lodged שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham; there וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- there and behold the word יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, to וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer [came] to him and he said ל֔וֹ lo, מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What לְּךָ֥ le-Cha פֹ֖ה <S%H6311><s%> foh here אֵלִיָּֽהוּ׃ <S%H452><s%> 'e-li-Ya-hu. Elijah

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mer And he said קַנֹּ֨א <S%H7065><s%> kan-No I have been very קִנֵּ֜אתִי <S%H7065><s%> kin-Ne-ti jealous לַיהוָ֣ה׀ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei God צְבָא֗וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot, of hosts כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for עָזְב֤וּ <S%H5800><s%> 'a-ze-Vu have forsaken בְרִֽיתְךָ֙ <S%H1285><s%> ve-ri-te-Cha thy covenant בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei for the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִזְבְּחֹתֶ֣יךָ <S%H4196><s%> miz-be-cho-Tei-cha thine altars הָרָ֔סוּ <S%H2040><s%> ha-Ra-su, thrown down וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et נְבִיאֶ֖יךָ <S%H5030><s%> ne-vi-'Ei-cha thy prophets הָרְג֣וּ <S%H2026><s%> ha-re-Gu and slain בֶחָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> ve-Cha-rev; with the sword וָֽאִוָּתֵ֤ר <S%H3498><s%> va-'iv-va-Ter and I [even] I only am left אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni and I לְבַדִּ֔י <S%H905><s%> le-vad-Di, alone וַיְבַקְשׁ֥וּ <S%H1245><s%> vay-vak-Shu and they seek אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נַפְשִׁ֖י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi my life לְקַחְתָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3947><s%> le-kach-Tah. to take it away

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer, And he said צֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> tze Go forth וְעָמַדְתָּ֣ <S%H5975><s%> ve-'a-mad-Ta and stand בָהָר֮ <S%H2022><s%> va-Har upon the mount לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָה֒ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD וְהִנֵּ֧ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And behold the LORD עֹבֵ֗ר <S%H5674><s%> 'o-Ver, passed by וְר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> ve-Ru-ach wind גְּדוֹלָ֡ה <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lah and a great וְחָזָ֞ק <S%H2389><s%> ve-cha-Zak and strong מְפָרֵק֩ <S%H6561><s%> me-fa-Rek rent הָרִ֨ים <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rim the mountains וּמְשַׁבֵּ֤ר <S%H7665><s%> u-me-shab-Ber and brake in pieces סְלָעִים֙ <S%H5553><s%> se-la-'Im the rocks לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, the LORD לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not בָר֖וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> va-Ru-ach [was] not in the wind יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; [but] the LORD וְאַחַ֤ר <S%H310><s%> ve-'a-Char and after הָר֨וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> ha-Ru-ach the wind רַ֔עַשׁ <S%H7494><s%> Ra-'ash, an earthquake לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not בָרַ֖עַשׁ <S%H7494><s%> va-Ra-'ash [was] not in the earthquake יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. [but] the LORD

וְאַחַ֤ר <S%H310><s%> ve-'a-Char And after הָרַ֙עַשׁ֙ <S%H7494><s%> ha-Ra-'ash the earthquake אֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> 'Esh, a fire לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not בָאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> va-'Esh [was] not in the fire יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; [but] the LORD וְאַחַ֣ר <S%H310><s%> ve-'a-Char and after הָאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> ha-'Esh, the fire ק֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol voice דְּמָמָ֥ה <S%H1827><s%> de-ma-Mah a still דַקָּֽה׃ <S%H1851><s%> dak-Kah. small

וַיְהִ֣י׀ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become כִּשְׁמֹ֣עַ <S%H8085><s%> kish-Mo-a' heard אֵלִיָּ֗הוּ <S%H452><s%> 'e-li-Ya-hu, And it was [so] when Elijah וַיָּ֤לֶט <S%H3874><s%> vai-Ya-let [it] that he wrapped פָּנָיו֙ <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nav his face בְּאַדַּרְתּ֔וֹ <S%H155><s%> be-'ad-dar-To, in his mantle וַיֵּצֵ֕א <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-Tze and went out וַֽיַּעֲמֹ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> vai-ya-'a-Mod and stood פֶּ֣תַח <S%H6607><s%> Pe-tach in the entering in הַמְּעָרָ֑ה <S%H4631><s%> ham-me-'a-Rah; of the cave וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav about ק֔וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol, And behold [there came] a voice וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer unto him and said מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- What לְּךָ֥ le-Cha פֹ֖ה <S%H6311><s%> foh here אֵלִיָּֽהוּ׃ <S%H452><s%> 'e-li-Ya-hu. Elijah
